title.rendered: IRMIX Radio Top 20 Countdown for Week Ending April 15, 2023

content.rendered:
Intelligent Diva on IRMIX Radio Top 20 Indie Chart

IRMIX Radio Top 20 Indie Countdown Chart Week Ending April 15 2023

IRMIX Radio Top 20 Indie Countdown Chart Week Ending April 15 2023 20 to 11

IRMIX Radio Top 20 Countdown for Week Ending April 15, 2023

DETROIT, MICHIGAN, UNITED STATES, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — IRMIX Radio is now reporting playlists to music tracking agencies for national charting purposes. IRMIX Radio’s format is RnB, Hip-Hop, and Dance music. IRMIX Radio is currently accepting songs for airplay with the caveat that any song submitted that is older than 90 days old will not be eligible for charting.

To be considered for IRMIX Radio’s Top 20 Countdown the songs must be less than 90 days old. Please be sure to follow the instructions carefully for submission of your track(s) or it will be rejected. Prior to your track being submitted please be sure to include detailed information.

Artist name, track name, album name if applicable, release date, artist social media for tagging, and biography.

Additionally, IRMIX Radio has promotion opportunities available for independent artists, to learn more about the opportunities please visit https://irmixradio.net/artist-promotions

IRMIX Radio Top 20 Indie Countdown for Week Ending April 15, 2023

20. DimenDave – Bedroom

19. Marco Featuring Farisha – Bottom of the List

18. Beauty in the Breakdown – Thinking Bout You

17. Parallel – The Black Man

16. Nisha Nandez – Hurt So Bad

15. Kasha – I Want You

14. Tiny Ray Featuring CoCo Chaniels – About the Check

13. O.K. Tone – Got to Tell You

12. Dossi – I Want You

11. Rhymie Lee – Fight Night

10. Chisom – Yes, Yes, (Lagos Night)

9. Only 1 Theory – Hard Smoke

8. ArtherRay Featuring Sluggah – No Love

7. Reckless Rhymacide – We Came to Party

6. Monica P. – Choices

5. Intelligent Diva Featuring Sean Kingston – How to Flex

4. LaWanda Lee – Reminisce

3. Melo Young – Just the Beginning

2. Eempy Slicker – Groovy Attitude

1. Intelligent Diva – Fly Together
